description:
Windows monitoring Dashboard.

(Translated StarsL.cn's work. ID: 10467)

targets.expr:
# interrupts seem to be included into privileged mode counter
sum by (mode) (rate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance=~"$instance", mode="privileged"}[$__rate_interval])) - on() group_left() sum(rate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance=~"$instance", mode=~"interrupt|dpc"}[$__rate_interval]))

title: Node / Windows / Details
